A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: *SPOILERS* I’ve never written a review\, but I feel compelled. The difference between TLJ and TFA is this for me: I felt pure joy/sadness/emotion during TFA and felt nothing during TLJ. I was numb. As weird as this sounds\, I just didn’t get that “feeling” that all previous Star Wars films give me. JJ Abrams set up so many cool ideas and none of them paid off. Its like Rian came on\, looked at JJs ideas\, and said... nah\, Im good. Lets kill Snoke and Luke and make Rey a nobody. Very disappointed.
